response.overview: "Without Flesh Or Voice" is a poetic, experimental fiction film featuring a ghost wandering through vast expanses, sometimes in absurd situations. He personifies human transparency, this spectral otherness that is nonetheless very much present, everywhere unnoticed because the order of our society has decided that it doesn't deserve our consideration. It embodies social invisibility in a society where norms are often exclusionary and power is held by a minority. The voice-over, on the other hand, gives weight to the words, which can be used as a lever to break out of this silence and indifference.
response.tagline: Have you ever tried to disappear? Or to let words take control?
response.title: Without Flesh or Voice
